name: global mean atmospheric surface pressure over the ocean and sea-ice
dataset_description: Global mean atmospheric surface pressure over the ocean and sea-ice

name: global mean sea level anomalies including barystatic and sterodynamic terms
core products of the IERS Special Bureau for the Oceans
fields: xoamc, yoamc, zoamc, xoamp, yoamp, zoamp, xoamp_dsl, yoamp_dsl, zoamp_dsl, mass, xcom, ycom, zcom, sboarea, xoamc_si, yoamc_si, zoamc_si, mass_si, xoamp_fw, yoamp_fw, zoamp_fw, mass_fw, xcom_fw, ycom_fw, zcom_fw, mass_gc
comment: Dataset fields include core products of the IERS Special Bureau for the Oceans (https://euler.jpl.nasa.gov/sbo/sbo_home.html), including ocean angular momentum (OAM), center of mass (COM) and global ocean mass, calculated using the basic formulation of Gross et al. (2000). Further details on the available fields are provided in Quinn et al. (2019).
